content.detailedDescription: It was the day after memorial day.I was walking to work i walked under a over pass when i came out the other side.Some reason i looked to my right and up about 45 degrees.I saw a round object glowing like coals in a fire.Ive walk this route on a daily basis never once seeing anything like this.I started walking backwords watching this object.It kept glowing bright then it would die down then it would do it over again.About 15 minutes or so i watched it get very bright then it went out.As if someone just turned a light switch off.The feelings i had were am i really seeing what im seeing .More or less in awe.I felt like i had goose bumps over my entire body.
content.summary: Saw round pulsating object glowing like coals in a burn pit .As i watched it  faded out.

content.detailedDescription: Wings like a bird in a bent position square  back and bottom  no noise moving away from me to the north abouve frankstown mt.No movement of the wing but  was climbing in altatude
content.summary: Wings like a b ird but to big for a bird

content.detailedDescription: Riding bikes through neighborhood down breakwater way to minnesota avenue/carmel parkway intersection at approximately 8:35 - 8:37 pm on 8/21/11. in glancing up to the north/east, two unusual objects were clearly visible resting in the night sky. each object was about a half a hand outstretched and a hand apart. the formation on the left had two large white lights - which looked almost like a car headlights to an invisible car. the object to the right looked something like the pleiades but upon standing stationary and staring, there were white dots of lights grouped in a boomerang shape. both objects seemed to have a shape blending with the dark night sky to which the lights were attached. the two-light object on the left had brighter lights than the one on the right. the lights were white or whitish blue. the lights did not blink. the objects made no detectible sound. both objects appeared to be still but upon closer observation were moving in tandem off to the north/east. while trying to follow the trajectory of the objects on bike and upon crossing the intersection, the objects were suddenly no longer visible. if the objects were aircraft they would have still been quite visible from a farther distance but it appears as though they vanished from the night sky. there was a lot of air traffic during this evening but these objects looked absolutely nothing like air traffic and appeared quite large. no air traffic appeared to be nearby these objects.
content.summary: Two objects in tandem over brentwood, contra costa, ca - aug 21 8:35 pm pst

content.detailedDescription: I was at the lake with some friends about 4 of us observed this anomaly i was just star gazing when i noticed a red light to the west moving up and down repeatedly and the light started to move side to side the distance it was moving was several miles apart in a maybe a second and repeated to move up and down the side to side for about ten minutes when above us a military jet flew over head toward the object and when it began to close in on object to shot from straight in front of me to directly my right which had to be over 20 miles in the blink of an eye it to the jet to get from where the ufo had been to where it was almost a minute to get close to it again and when it did finally get close again the object zoomed back where it was then started to bob up and down again and side to side the jet tried to get close to it two or three more times all with the same result then finally left after the ufo had shot to my left and moved out of site in about two seconds only reason i believe it was a ufo is that no aircraft that man knows about can move perfectly straight up and down stop then move perfectly side to side
content.summary: Red light bobbing up and down then side to side repeatedly military airplane tried to chase

content.detailedDescription: I keep seeing a star like entity in the gulf of mexico which flashes in the colors of the rainbow.
content.summary: I keep seeing star that flashes  in colors. it is over ther gulf

content.detailedDescription:
First off, i can���t write about the technology they had because it���s not the point nor important according to the beings. what is the point are the messages i received.  these being come to me when i���m in bed but i feel them all the time and can get messages from anytime almost.

i have come across three beings at different times, there is this guy with white curly clean looking shiny long hair, he has bigger eyes than us, but the pupils are grey with white on outside. he wears a white cap, his uniform is also white with gold trimming on the shoulders chest and neck and by the ribs. he has some kind of marking on his forehead, but it has a light on t so i can really see it, he has a staff that looks like wood he stick it out towards me i can see he has a ring on is finger its silver with a grey sphere, he also has what looks like a white arm strap or arm band, this arm band has silver sphere���s or small domes on in going around it. he is very strong i can see his arm muscles. he also has a glow or light behind him.  he tells me basically to worry about my soul, to work as much as i can on my soul, to be as nice and kind and helpful as i can be, to change better. he tells me not to worry about worldly things he says it���s just a distraction from my goals. i have to stay focused. to be as pure as i can be. to talk and reach out to all who will listen.

the second man i encounter is a younger man. he has long brown curly shiny hair clean looking. he also has a light behind him and on his forehead, he also carries a wooden staff, he is not as big muscle wise as the white man. he has a grey uniform on with gold trimming on the shoulders chest and neck and by the ribs.  he was tall. he had brown eyes. he also has a cap. this man talks more open with me, he just gives me ideas or suggestions or thoughts he is not as firm as the white man. he just gives suggestion or thought and ideas.

the third being i encountered was a female. she had long blond shiny hair. it was not curly, it was straight she too had light behind her and on her forehead. she also was wearing a cap. her uniform and cap was a tan color with gold trimming on the shoulders chest and neck and by the ribs.  she also had a wooden staff. she had blues eyes. she was tall. she seems to be a messenger or maybe a transporter? or to get info from one being and give it to another, so it seems.  when she approached me she had her staff out then dropped her head. she then lifted her head and with both arms to stuck her staff out to me with both arms horizontally as is bushing towards me. she then dropped it a little but, then suddenly push it into the air and began to spin her staff around really fast t to the point where i almost didn���t see it, when she was done what looks like a star map or a galaxy appeared above her, i could see the map i don���t know much about stars or maps or anything like that but i remember it somehow,  she then pointed to a place on the map then to another with a few second pause she pointed back to her original place.  

i have a picture of what i think it���s the ���star map��� i saw i based this on this because when she pointed the first place she pointed to was almost on the outside of the  star map and the second place she pointed to was almost  but not in the middle of the map.
content.summary: I was inside the ship

content.detailedDescription: Labor day 2010, while traveling up i-85 from atlanta to charlotte i was in the passenger seat of a friends car. i observed a bright yellow "star" which i soon realized was changing in orientation to the surrounding stars. my entire family in aviation, i naturally attempted to identify the make of aircraft i assumed it would be. while nearing us i began to notice various neon spectrum colors emanating in sequence from the craft that didn't seem to coincide with and commercial airliner lights i had seen to date. very rapidly the craft approached and descended to a very low altitude, roughly 60 feet, just above the tree tops lining the highway. the craft, whose primary hull was ovalian, with a structure resembling and iron cross cross section through the axis of the vehicle. one of the squared edges of the cross section was wider than the other three with 4 small yet intense yellow lights running parallel to it's edge. each of the other three squared sections had a large intense yellow light. there was a row of 8 multicolored lights flashing along the central axis of the cross section, each light would flash a different color nearly every time it illuminate, it did this in constant and rapid succession. the wider section appeared to be the rear at first, but as it approached us and descended  just about the trees it halted and reversed course almost instantaneously. we immediately pull off the highway at the cowpens exit and stopped at a closed fireworks shop just off the highway and walked out into the adjacent field. the craft slowly moved over us the shot at a dramatic angle towards the mountains and again halted. it was then approached by an identical craft. both flashed their sequential lights under theirs frames directly towards each other then both simultaneously made 3-4 clockwise rotations around each other then broke away from one another. these first 2 craft traveled silently in opposing directions with dramatic right angle movements towards 2 additional craft which had just appeared from behind the mountains. the first 2 repeated the "communication dance" with the 2 new craft. the 4 then began to rapidly comb the area silently covering great distances with erratic and jerky movements. one of the came back over to our area of the field and flew directly over us, lowering as it approached the ascending after passing us. this time it did not move in a straight line but side to side as it moved forward as if traveling on some sort of wave form. moments later they re congregated briefly the shot off in 4 different directions all disappearing quickly and silently.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft approached our vehicle, halted just above trees lining the highway and reversed course to follow. we stopped in a field to observe object the raced up and away toward several other objects.

content.detailedDescription: On 8/20 at 1:30am i went outside to have a cigarette. to the east over my fence i saw a star-like object with flashing colors. i thought it was an airplane, and watched it for awhile. it wasn't moving very far or fast as a plane would. after observing it for 1 hour it ascended slowly and moved south over my neighbors house. at that point it stopped and proceeded to move across the sky with the rest of the stars. two hours and fifteen minutes later a second object appeared where i originally saw the first one. it was fainter and more green and blue than red like the first one. it followed the exact trajectory as the first one, and stopped exactly in the same place. by this time the first one had moved some distance with the stars but both were still visible. i observed them through binoculars and the lights were plainly visible pulsing in reds greens yellows and blues. i kept watching them fascinated, and sometime later moving lights appeared near the first one. they moved like satellites, but two of them disappeared after a very short distance. one light appeared by the second one later, appearing and disappearing 3 times. i have gone out every night since and witnessed the same phenomenon every night, and seen as many as three at one time (one in straight line flight). oddly, they appear where normal stars appear (big dipper etc) and the next night they are usually somewhere else.
content.summary: Blue green red white lights flashing star-like objects

content.detailedDescription: it was coming from the north heading south it looked to stop for very short time miliaseconds maybe then looked to change path a bit not much and went on going south and i watched till i could not see the pretty flashing anymore ...It was not the iss or comet not a plane and there is a airport near by but never in my life seen this before there was no faa lights nothing  it was a ufo unidentified flying object thats for sure
content.summary: It was pretty blue red then white then pules them colors on off on off on off

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a hillside with my partner just sitting down and talking under the stars overlooking the property. we were not paying much attention to the sky but i noticed there was (what i first thought) a plane heading across my lower view of the sky and the light that it was emitting was not blinking in an orderly fashion as a plane normally does. instead it would have long pauses between some blinks and other erratic behavior.

we continued to watch it as it became apparent that it was not your typical aircraft. it began doing some pretty crazy maneuvers...Changing course abruptly but gracefully, hovering, etc. it ascended below our line of sight and ascended a number of times. our last glance was when it descended below our line of sight one last time and we did not see it pick back up.

i would love to know what this was so please direct me to where i might get some answers and also alert me to other people who may have reported this.
content.summary: One white light that blinked randomly with strange but graceful flight path

content.detailedDescription: The event took place on the evening following the northridge earthquake, january 17, 1994 -- approximately 10pm, but it was so long ago, i cannot remember the exact time. our home was damaged and we (my husband, my mother, myself, and our dog)were in our car, parked across from our home in sherman oaks. we were on the west side of the street. my mother (in the back seat) and my husband (front seat -- driver's side) were asleep. i was sitting in the front passenger seat, with my dog (small poodle) sitting on my lap. i was facing south. i saw a group of lights in the sky. they were not sacttered, but in formation. they were at a southwest direction from where i was. there was no sound or apparent movement until they took off, in an instant, at a sharp angle, and disappeared. until that occurred, they remained in formation. my sense was that they were observing the devastation below -- the aftermath of the earthquake. they were not helicopters, as far as i could tell. and helicopters could not take off at the angle that they did and all at once, as this happened.
content.summary: I observed a group of lights, in formation, that took off, together at a sharp angle and disappeared in an instant.

content.detailedDescription:
1:i was on my roof watching the stars about 30 feet above the ground.

2:this might sound weired but i said i know your out there and come to me , and right after those words came from my mouth the uf0 came infront of me.

3:showing me that their out there and also responded to me.

4:i know for a fact their was  no plane, no other form of craft was even near it. it moved sighlently and slowly with no lights so i couldnt be seen i suppose, it moved about a 50feet or so then shot at a super fast speed nothing like i have ever seen before nothing on this planet can move as fast as wat i seen today.

5.Shocked, and nervos.

6.Shot at a very high speed.
content.summary: Right in front of my eyes a grey like round shaped with a point at the front.

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from bostwick lake inn, noticed bright object stationary and flickering colore3d lights. under binocular observation multiple colored lights randomly alternating, stationary. called 911 to report unidentified object....Serious and asked them to look ne in kent county
content.summary: Blinking hovering not moving

content.detailedDescription:
While standing outside at work i noticed a star like object that flashed different colors randomly.  i have seen this same object in the sky before and often wondered what it could be, because of the noticeable flashing and changing of colors it does.  it always seemed to stay in one place though.  tonight i stepped out of the building with another guy, and had seen the same flashing light.  only this time it was also moving from side to side, and up and down.  i asked wayne if he was seeing the same thing i was, and he asked me what it could be.  i let him know i have no idea, but have seen the flashing light often, but this is the first time i have seen it move in such a way.  then another guy from my work came out also, we asked if we were crazy or if he was seeing it move also? he watched for a couple seconds and asked the same question, "what is that thing?". he of course got the same answer, which is, "i wish i knew". i have tried to investigate online, and i have seen videos people have taken that look like the same object in other parts of the world.  anybody know what this is?

dale
content.summary: Saw flashing light in the sky that was moving side to side, and changing altitude slightly.

content.detailedDescription:
Was coming home after running an errand for a friend in a neighboring village 5 miles to the north of town.  upon reaching the village/city limits i noticed something slowly moving overhead at a creeping rate of speed.  once it was over the north end of town, i had to stop the car because i was struck in awe at the immense size of the craft.  could clearly see the underneath side of it from the street lights of town.  
it looked like it had low rectangular protrusions with antennas on the underneath surface of it.  shadowing outline of the top of the craft made it appear to be hat shaped, but it was clear to see from the underneath side that it was an obtuse triangle in shape, with the long point going forward.  i thought i had better flash my headlights on the car at it in hopes that it would recognize me as friendly.  there were two lights to each side of it, port & starboard, that identically repeated my signaling back.  then it slowly geared up from its hovering position and was gone in less than 5 seconds.  i guessed it to be at least 300yards wide at the rear of the craft(which was facing me) and 500 yards long.  for something as big as this was, i was utterly amazed how smoothly and how fast it took off without one bit of sound.  what i thought took place in about 10 minutes, was actually about 30 minutes.  what really gave me the creeps was that i was not even 200 feet away from a farmers place, nobody appeared to be home, no other traffic came up or passed by. the only living beings that saw anything were peoples dogs in and around town, barking like crazy.  oddly enough, i was at the local cafe the next morning having breakfast and overheard an old man complaining about the dogs raising hell the night before.  nobody ever mentioned seeing what i saw, and i figured people would think i was crazy if i had said anything about it.  tried to tell a good friend about it and she just spoofed at me by telling me i was stoned...  i will tell you right now, i did not smoke anything or drink anything or take anything that would have impaired my senses ability to function properly.  needless to say, the sighting amazingly scared me into the love of jesus...  i didn't scared easily before the incident.
content.summary: So huge that it caught  my curiosity at first then totally freaked me out after it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
this is 2nd night in a row.  last night approx 9pm taking dog for a walk and watching storm clouds from the west approach, we noticed a large star in the western sky of rochester, ny, just after sunset, too large and low for a real star - realized it was actually moving.  it seemed to oscillate and wobble. 3 people walking by stopped to witness this also.  we are near the airport and aircraft traveled on their normal flight path (higher and away from the object)so it couldn't have been a star. 
     it shimmered shades of white/blue and a faint shade of red/pink.  we were not afraid but fascinated.  at that point we also noticed to the right of it, were 3 smaller star-like objects in the form of a triangle that were also "wobbly."   i went home to get my camcorder but upon return, they all had faded at that point to tiny grey spots.
     this is going on again right now as i type this with 2 other witnesses that were walking home from work at the hospital.  i just used binoculars and made out a large white glowing spherical shape but it was so bright and wobbling, hard to tell so i used our telescope (not state of the art).  it had the appearance of more than one glowing sphere either attached to one object or just clustered together. again it was moving and hard to focus but the triangle cluster of "stars" next to it appeared again but too dark to get a good picture.  
     of note, this was an area where i had posted a sighting on the 4th of july with pictures of the original sighting of glowing spheres rapidly rising from the western horizon with approx 14 in all that flew above us and disappeared overhead.  the "zoom in" feature will show the "x" shaped object with 4 firey spheres on each end.  again, we weren't in fear but fascinated.   thank you for allowing me to share this, it was a life changing event.
content.summary: For 2nd night in a row, a jittery star object like seen in ma, wobbling and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9am on august 24, 2011, i was headed se on highway 30. before i reached the sauvie island bridge, i saw what looked like a plane in the sky -- white, glimmering, about the right size. i watched and waited to see its wings. instead it remained sort of roundish and it seemed to
be turning, since the light reflection looked like its changing. so i
started to wonder if it was a helicopter but very high up. as it turned,
it got darker -- and suddenly it was gone. since i was driving, i
really couldn't scan the sky much to find it. i kind of smiled to
myself and thought that it was sort of like a ufo sighting.

as i got closer to linnton, however, i saw the thing again! the experience was the similar only it took place over about 10 seconds
instead of 30 or so. it started out glimmering, then "turned", went
dark, and was gone. at this point, i started to be curious. did i just lose track of it before? because i was driving slower this time, i was able to search the sky a bit. nothing.

i got my first stop of the drive at kittridge and 30. i looked up again curious if i could spot it one more time. sure enough, i saw the thing a third time. i had better chance to watch it while the streetlight was red. there were clearly 3 lights and a y- or t-shaped frame that looks like a plane without its nose. so i thought that was pretty weird. all of a sudden, the lights on it go out one by one, briefly revealing a gray color. at first, it seemed like it has disappeared again. but i squinted and realized that i could it flying away se -- a little more east than i'm facing. it quickly faded away into the sky's haze. i' would say it was fast like a jet,
but the haze gave me the impression it was moving higher and faster
than jets i've seen. i eventually lost sight of it in the distance.

and that's it! i'm still mildly spooked about it and am saddened that i've yet to find any other sightings of it on the internet. i really don't know what i saw but it was definitely unlike anything i've ever seen. so i felt it best to share my sighting since others might be doing the same.
content.summary: T-shaped gray frame with 3 white lights in triangle arrangement

content.detailedDescription: I was around 16 or 17 yrs old with several friends and we seen a boomarang shape object circle in the ski. we all say did you see that. "i saw it, so what did you see."  confirmed image of what i saw threw 5 others.  started talking about what we saw and it appeared again as a boomarang circleing the ski and form into a triangle and dissappeared.  i suppose the triangle shape was from the back of the aircraft accelerating away.  this instance was over 12 years ago and there are several wittnesses.
content.summary: A bumarang shape of lights zooming across the ski then appearing as a triangle then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription:
I could not sleep and as usual got up to have coffee on my screen porch before work.  it was approximately 5:15 am (obviously dark out)- my porch faces east and there are no lights viewable or civilization east of my home with the exception of one light tower (due west). at night when i have been on the porch i can view planes coming west/northwest across the state...The light of the plane appears bright for a time and then the angle changes as it approaches, still viewable but not directed at "me" - the plane eventually flies over and is audible.  after several sips of coffee, i notice the light, still approaching me, is still very bright and still angled at me.  then it occurred to me that i have never seen a plane this early in the morning...Then it stopped.  i questioned my sanity...Maybe i didn't just see it come towards my home...Maybe it was a star - so much brighter than any other in the sky this morning? it was early. but it stopped?  maybe i hadn't had enough coffee yet? i then picked up my binoculars, normally used for viewing cows/horses/armadillos & coyote's and viewed this object for almost an hour! i could only see the lights and a very faint outline of the top of something?  there were 5 lights, in almost a straight line....If you were to line them up 1,2,3,4 & 5 - 3 would be the brightest, biggest or almost like it was the "point" and mainly white.  was this because it was directly angled in my direction?  1,2 and 4,5 were a little smaller than 3 and looked as though they were slightly angled back from 3, but they were the same size.  the lights pulsated from blue to green to white to red (or maybe it was red to white), but #3 mainly stayed white.  the pulse was so very quick it was difficult to follow the sequence.  i was able to discern the different colors but they almost "rainbowed or melded together" in the process? i continued to watch for almost an hour, telling myself that i wasn't seeing what i was actually seeing...Putting the binoculars down...Another sip of coffee...Was it still there? - yes.  until...The sun was coming up, the stars were now gone, the "lights" were still faintly there....Then they went straight up into the sky... and gone?  i did not mention this to anyone until sunday morning...Trying to convince myself that i had not just seen "something".  
this was viewed from east lee county, estero, florida.
content.summary: Viewed unidentified object from my screen porch for approx. 1 hour on 8/16 or 17/11 starting at  5:15 am

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was a plane but it didn't move. i pulled out binocs and watched this, what i thought was a plane heading east over the lake. it never moved it just flashed red, blue, white lights. so i pulled out my video camera to video tape which i did. i even have a plane come into view twice but it never moved it just hover. i didn't know who to call or question what we were seeing. chicago executive airport is close in wheeling, il and i thought this was going to land there but it just hovered from 5:00am until light around 6:15 and when sun came up lights were gone. but when the sun was rising you could see the stars disapear but this object and the moon were the only thing left as the sun rose. this was not venus this object had a red, blue and white lights.
content.summary: 5am in east sky,watched with wife until daylight and lost sight 615am did anyone else see report it?

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work one night in mid/late june. there are lots of planes and helicopters that fly around in the air around union county. this did not appear as anything i had seen before. i drive down route 33 on my way to work each night for my 3rd shift job in dublin. i seen a bright white light in the sky larger than any star. it was a very clear nightno clouds that i could tell. i kept driving down the highway untill the light started to dim and changed into a dull orange light. it looked as if the light were dimming to the point it almost dissappeared. when i was a couple miles away from where it was apparently hovering it turned bright white again and i could see two red pulsating lights lower to both sides of the object. these red lights looked to be slowly pulsating while the white light stayed bright. i was right beside the object on the highway when i pulled over to look at it. it was on the other side of the highway over a field. it appeared to be about the height up of possibly a 8 - 12 story building? there was a area with trees besides the field and the object was about twice their height up in the sky. there was also another car on the side of the road, i presume the person was also looking at this "craft." i sat in my car and rolled down the window as i looked at this thing. it stayed in position for about one minute until it suddenly slowly started to move along the direction of the highway at the speed i could only describe at a crawl or very slowly. this was the only time i had seen the object move. i became frightened and decided i needed to get to work. i drove away and looked into the mirror and continued to see it until i went around the highway that goes past the post road exit. i would like to let it be known that it appeared as a triangle shape and the stars from the sky did not appear to show through the middle of the craft. i did not hear any sounds or see any solid surface although it seemed as though there might have been an edge on it. it was too dark to tell and the lights were very bright.
content.summary: Light in the distance on my way to work, soon appears to be 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription: Having a smoke on my balcony watching the sky and saw a very bright light that went over my house not making a sound,my jaw dropped and i lost sight after it went over the house.I ran down stairs and out to the front but lost it behind trees.However the same thing was seen in the neighboring city by my 16 yr old cousin.I know what i saw and it wasn't a meteor,shooting star,plane, heli.It was something completely different! i now 100% believe
content.summary: Bi gowin orb with no sound or flashing lights going north,seemed to go lower then higher.Also seen in mchenry, il

content.detailedDescription: This is a long story. i was 21 years old, living in an old farm house between hoskins and winside. it was sunday night, 7:00 p.M., jan. 07 1975.I had to drive a freind home to norfolk, and, my roommate and he rode with me. as we walked out to the car, we noticed up the hill was an unlikely white light with a red flashing light in the southern horizon.We were only one day out of a blizzard, and the winds were picking up to about 45 m.P.H. and some. we all noticed that the lights were hovering like a helicopter, but, we knew it was to windy for it to stay in one spot for so long. temperature was about 20 below with windchill.       we got into my brand new volkswagen scirrocco to warm up,and i turned my car towards the lights. as were watching through the windsheid as the car warmed up, i decided to flash my headlifghts at the craft. i flashed them twice, and, inbetween flashes a great white flash came from the craft and it dropped slowly behind the hill. at the moment it flashed at us my car totally quit running. it kind of startled me. i am an ase. certified mechanic, so i proceeded to check out my car, witch took ten minutes. by this time i was freezing, and, i told the other guys, lets go back in the house and warm up,and, talk about what we had just seen. i knew my car had lost spark from the ignition coil, but i didn't find any reason for that. after 15 minutes ore so, iwent out to crank my car, and without doing anything to fix it, it started right up. we all loaded up and proceeded to norfolk. we headed north from the farmhouse,when, all of a sudden the sky light up like lightning. less than one half mile down the road was aneighbors farmhouse. as we came to an intersection, we seen a green light,about the same color as a street light. it was inbetween the farmhouse and the barn (neighbors).It started out about the size of a softball, and then, it grew to approximately 25 feet wide. then it faded to black. it continued for about five minutes, as if, it were taking photographs of us(ground level). then it stopped until we went around the farmhouse and had to turn around,because snowdrifted road. we came back by, and it started glowing the green light again. this was very life altering for me. my witnesses cant help, because one passed away at age 38 in the 80's, and the other is either mentally fragile, or, the erased his memory {roomate}. i hope to here from you. i've tried for years to find someone to report this to.   p.S.  this ain't all (2 more).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Car died ufo went down behind hill. reappeared later. tried  to communicate

content.detailedDescription:
Two pictures taken on may 10 2004 during a charter fishing trip.

objects were apparently not visible to the naked eye but appeared clearly and in an extremely realistic fashion. one appearng and a tiered shaped craft with distorted "field" around it with another "ball-like" object nearby. possible observing for an unknown reason (object might appear to be a weight hanging off a pole but is not because the boat is in transit and the object is clearly above where a weight would normally hang..)

second photograhph shows a curved like object that is clearly defined and extremely odd shaped, almoust like a boomerang. clearly reflective. (almost "surreal-looking") another "ball-like" object can be seen above the individuals head when zoomed it. used scanner w/ 1200 dpi for second photo and only about 600 for the first(which contains both photos).

i have decided not to blot out the faces in the photograph to prevent the accusation of tampering.

notes: in retrospect i did not feel "strange" during this time.
why the objects only appear in the photographs i am in is unknown.
blots on the emulsion can be most likely ruled out, especially conserning the second photograph in high resolution.


anyone attempting to contact me should email me at :ghandivitamine@gmail.Com (yes i know its silly)
serious individuals only. i will not be interviewed under most circumstances. these photos are the only proof i need.Feel free to discuss your opinion on the matter. all matters discussed with me are confidential.
content.summary: U.F.O accidently photographed in 2004 on fishing trip

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in our house near the center of andover, ma. i finished up some software programming and web surfing around 2:20am, aug. 25th, 2011. i walked from my office to our bedroom on the second floor. it was a clear night and i looked out my bedroom window to the west. there are two tall trees with a space between them in the back yard. between the trees, perhaps 6 inches above the tree line from my perspective, i spotted a starlike object a good distance off, perhaps 1-3 miles if i had to guess. however, i quickly noticed that it might not be stationary. it was not progressing across my field of view in any direction, but it was moving. it appeared to be fluttering or bouncing. it was subtle, so i walked right up to the window and braced myself to try and rule out my movements as a source of the strange behavior. it was still moving. i saw no red or blue lights as required by most/all aircraft. (i've taken 20 hours of flight training, so i know a little about small planes, but i'm only a beginner.) i'd say it was as bright as the north star can be at times, perhaps a little brighter. the movements seemed too erratic and significant for either an airplane or helicopter. i scanned the sky and noted no other stars as bright, and in fact, based on the angle and city/town lights, there were only one or two stars easily visible from what i recall. they were an order of magnitude dimmer. i watched for about 30 seconds when i considered grabbing my wife's iphone 3gs off her night table as she slept. but the object was far enough away that the iphone's  camera (2 megapixel) would not have captured the movement, so i left the bedroom to find my digital slr downstairs in the kitchen. unfortunately, while i was in my bedroom, my daughter had woken up, walked to the top of the stairs leading down to the kitchen, laid down and fell back to sleep. i carried her back to her bed in the room next to ours and tucked her in. i retrieved my camera from downstairs and grabbed a more capable lens on the way. by the time i got back to the window, about 4-6 minutes later, the object was gone. in my mind, this ruled out the possibility of it being a star or other celestial body, but i'm no astronomer. i watched periodically for another 30 minutes, but did not see anything. i did some googling and searched twitter from any other recent sightings and noted a recent sighting in broad daylight in acton, ma. i also read about a correlation between disasters and ufo sightings. the aug. 23 quake in virgina was felt in massachusetts, so this came to mind. my wife had woken up and did a few things while i kept looking. i didn't want to frighten her, so i saved the story until daylight. in summary, it was very strange. i've never seen anything like it. i should have asked my wife for help so that i could keep my eyes on it.
content.summary: Bright jittery starlike object observed from andover,ma

content.detailedDescription: I was on my bed using the laptop late at night when i saw lights flashing through my cellular shades. thought it might be the cops at first but it was flashing very fast and was white. ran out from my room and up the stairs to look out the window from the second floor and just saw the flashing lights illuminating the whole area. seemed to be coming from above as the roof of neighboring homes were lighting up with each flash. went on for about 15 to 25 seconds.
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside watering the crops and noticed what i thought was a bright star,then it started heading in my direction then came to a stop,thats when i ran into the house to get my cell phone to get some pics and yell for my wife,who came out,saw it also.
    the object zigzaged,seemed to come lower,(glow got alot brighter)then headed off east over my property,over the highway towards oregon city.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large egg/oval shaped, bright white(solid glow).

content.detailedDescription: Happened in 1951 or 1952 while riding my bike. i was approximately 6 years old at the time. i approached a terraced pasture from a wooded area where i had stopped. upon the highest terrace i observed an object that i thought to be some kind of airplane sitting stationary in the tall grass. as i approached the object, and before i was able to get within approximately 100 hundred feet, the object arose, hovered briefly then moved away from me.. slowly at first then when it had gotten maybe 500 yards away it just disappeared. i was unable to tell anyone exactly what shape it was, but best guess it was oval. also, it had what appeared to be windows, however all i remember seeing were probably just darker portions of the body of the craft. i remembering that i couldn't understand why i wasn't hearing any sound of an airplane. when i went up to the landing place all the tall grass was very flat and seemed to be swirled around in a circle. i remember riding my bike around inside that circle before i rode home to tell my dad and grandmother. and, later excitedly told my mom when she got home from work.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed stationary object, as i moved closer it arose, hovered then silently and slowely moved away and just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My information is second hand.  my mother, the largest skeptic in the world, was coming home from work.  she lives approx two miles from work.  she informed that as she reached the driveway to her home, she saw something hovering above the trees.  the object was described as having a shape of a rectangle, but one side curved downward to the bottom.  she also stated that numerous extremely bright lights were in various locations about the craft.

in disbelief, she turned the car off after rolling the driver's side and passenger's side windows completely down.  she began to panic because she could not hear anything.  also, while looking at this thing, she began to think that if she can see "them" they could certainly see her.  she started her vehicle, flew down the driveway (about 120 feet)ran into the home and tried to wake my father, he got up and they ran to the front door of their home - of course, the object was gone.

my mom and dad live on a small farm.  they do not have many neighbors.  the object was hovering above a beaver-dam pond.  she recently told me her story and i wish i knew what was going on.  my mother is very skeptical as is my dad.  my mom, is a registered nurse and a sunday school teacher.  she never believed our "ghost" stories and thought that all of that stuff was just mumbo-junbo.  ask her now, and she will tell you different!
content.summary: Size of a football field, not completely square (looked like a bread box)

content.detailedDescription:
It was a sunny afternoon and myself and passenger were driving home from a dog show.  we noticed a huge silver ball sitting at the edge of a farmers field. my initial thought is that it was a ball that they put on high lines for airplace safety, but then realized there were no such high lines in that area.  we stopped to take a look and walked up to it about 10 ft away.  it made no noise, it looked solid, it had no seams, it was not a balloon, it was approx 8ft in diameter. i then felt uncomfortable because it just didn't feel right.  we left and told the family when we got home what a strange anomoly we saw.  we passed by the next day and it was gone.  i never thought about it again until the local vancouver ufo society mentioned that there was a multiple sightings of silver balls in the sky over vancouver around that same time in 2000 or 2001.

now, the other strange anomily i have seen in my lifetime was in england, when i was 12 yrs old.  i went to timperely village, in cheshire, with my girlfriend and stopped along with all the other folk to see 5 silver balls falling from the sky, all attached by silver rods.  when they got to a certain height, they dettached from the rods and fell to the earth. no noise.  we ran home all excited and told my parents, who dismissed it as imagination.

strange coincidences:
content.summary: Circular silver ball approx 8ft in diameter
